desc:
WeThe5Pilots Research Labs And Consulting Services is a Aviation & Aerospace company and has headquarters in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India. It was founded in 2018.

We are an AeroSciences company engaged in Hi-Tech Product Engineering with a model to deliver fast and optimized solutions across engineering, modeling and product lifecycle management. Our product areas include Airplanes, Parachutes, Satellites, Vehicles and Rockets.

We create programs to enhance the participant's skill in the speciÔ¨Åc AeroSciences areas focusing to sharpen the design aspects of AeroSciences in the right manner with a perfect blend of DIY kits and hands on mentoring. The workshops impart the creative design thinking principles with our state of the art kits.
